column1: Little Goat Diner////took an uber to au cheval based on thrillist's recommendation. we arrived for lunch and it was a 1 hour wait so we decided to pick a place on the same block instead. blindly
column2: we walked into little goat which was not nearly as busy as au. we were drawn to the hip
column3: yet simple decor immediately. the menu was large- serving breakfast and dinner all day. we opted for cheeseburgers
column4: the all american. they were large and in charge. melt in your mouth beef
column5: a soft sesame seed bun and added thick cut bacon. why were more people not here?! guys- you don't need thrillist to recommend this. just go in and give it a shot!
